AboutMeText: since my first Raspberry Pi, I am interested in programming and what you can do with it. The sheer endless possibilities to create something new are just great. Whether it's a big project or a small temporary solution, everything is possible. The only limit is the one you build yourself.
ProjectsDescription-1: A Pokedex with all Pokemon from the first generation. The data is loaded from an API and displayed in a table. The table can be sorted by the different columns. The table can also be filtered by the name of the Pokemon.
ProjectsDescription-2: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
ProjectsDescription-3: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
